comments.author: Sariel V.7024
comments.body:
The icon is used by Godskull Rifle and Harpoon Gun (the latter was updated from a unique skin into a copy of the rifle).

Chat code for this is [&C40JAAA=] if you want to check out whatever it is.

comments.author: Sariel V.7024
comments.body: Periodically bundles and NPC items will slip through in the Items api. This is probably similar. :/

comments.body:
Looks like a bug in content to me :/

Skins have historically been … interesting.

comments.author: nightzirch.3126
comments.body: Came here to say the same thing. The skin should also have a name property

comments.author: Vikram Van Der Bruk.2359
comments.body:
Hello !
I was looking into the skins endpoint and I found at least one who seems to have some missing properties, the 2445.

https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/skins/2445

This one have no name and no flag (according to the wiki, it should have at least the flag “ShowInWardrobe”).

Is it a bug or am I missing something ?
